title: Define Project Requirements
description: Gather and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the DataFlowAnalyzer tool, including the types of software systems it should support (e.g., web applications, mobile apps, desktop apps), the data flow analysis techniques to be used (e.g., dynamic analysis, static analysis, hybrid approach), the desired visualization and reporting capabilities (interactive visualizations, customizable dashboards, exportable reports in various formats), integration with existing development tools such as IDEs, version control systems, and continuous integration/continuous deployment tools, and the specific user roles it should cater to (e.g., developers, QA engineers, DevOps). Also consider any necessary security requirements for handling sensitive data, scalability concerns for large software systems, and the tool's compatibility with various programming languages and frameworks.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the DataFlowAnalyzer tool, including the main components, their interactions, and the data flow between them.

title: Develop Data Ingestion Module
description: Implement the module responsible for ingesting and parsing the source code of the software systems to be analyzed.

title: Implement Data Flow Analysis Engine
description: Develop the core engine that performs the data flow analysis on the ingested source code, using the chosen analysis techniques.

title: Design Data Visualization and Reporting for DataFlowAnalyzer Tool
description: Design an intuitive user interface, effective data visualizations, and comprehensive reporting mechanisms for the DataFlowAnalyzer tool to present the results of AI-based data flow analysis within complex software systems.

title: Implement Data Visualization and Reporting
description: Develop the user interface and reporting components based on the approved design.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Configure the CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the DataFlowAnalyzer tool.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Create a comprehensive test suite for the DataFlowAnalyzer tool, covering unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Perform Security Audit
description: Conduct a security audit of the DataFlowAnalyzer tool to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities.

title: Write User Documentation
description: Create comprehensive user documentation, including installation guides, usage instructions, and troubleshooting tips.
